About.Title: About
About.Bio:
I was born in 1992 in Istanbul. I completed my undergraduate education at Mimar Sinan Fine Arts University Painting Department. 
I started tattooing in 2018 and continue to work in my own workshop. I love to paint everything from nature, especially botany, with colours.

Booking.Title: Make An Appointment
Booking.Info: I prefer to create personalized designs for each of my clients. Therefore, I ask you to support your ideas with visual examples when making an appointment. Remember to include the area(s) you want tattooed and the average measurements you have in mind.
